transition.to: textDisplay~My dream ends...and so did the movie. Yoshi was not pleased at me, but I don't mind. He went home to rush his homework. Meanwhile, I thought about the possibility of entering the dream world again.

task-node.name: textDisplay~My dream ends...and so did the movie. Yoshi was not pleased at me, but I don't mind. He went home to rush his homework. Meanwhile, I thought about the possibility of entering the dream world again.
